item.title: Best Compact GPUs for Small Form Factor (SFF) Builds in 2024
item.description:

Compact GPUs are essential for fitting into tight spaces while still delivering excellent performance. In this article, we’ll explore the best compact GPUs for SFF builds in 2024, focusing on performance, size, and value.

1. NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti (Compact Edition)

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti is a powerhouse in a compact form factor. With its efficient Ada Lovelace architecture, this GPU delivers excellent 1080p and 1440p gaming performance while staying cool and quiet. Its 200mm length makes it perfect for most SFF cases.

item.title: Budget SFF PC: Building a High-Performance Small Form Factor PC Without Breaking the Bank
item.description:
Building a small form factor (SFF) PC doesn’t have to drain your wallet. With smart planning and careful component choices, you can put together a compact yet high-performance system that stays within your budget. In this guide, we’ll walk you through the top budget components for an SFF build in 2025 and share tips to save money without sacrificing performance.

Why Build a Budget SFF PC?

Small form factor PCs are ideal for gamers, content creators, and professionals who need a powerful machine in a portable package. Although SFF builds can sometimes be expensive due to specialized parts, focusing on value-driven components lets you create a sleek, compact system without overspending.
